translations: conj.凭此，借以，与……一致；<非正式>在……的情况下，处于……的位置

phrs.translation: 凭什么, 借以, 靠那个, 其中
靠那个, 靠什么, 借以, 靠阿谁

sentences.sentence: They have introduced a new system whereby all employees must undergo regular training.
sentences.translation: 他们采用了新的制度，所有的雇员都必须定期进行培训。

sentences.sentence: The two colleges have a reciprocal arrangement whereby students from one college can attend classes at the other.
sentences.translation: 两所学院有一项互惠协定，允许学生在院际间选课。

sentences.sentence: The company operates an arrangement whereby employees may select any 8-hour period between 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. to go to work.
sentences.translation: 该公司做出了一种安排，据此员工可以在上午6点到晚上8点之间任意选择8个小时去上班。
